### Annual Returns

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| warning: false
library(webexercises)

set.seed(12345)

RQ1 <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.02, sd = 0.01)  # Q1 return
RQ2 <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.015, sd = 0.01) # Q2 return
RQ3 <- rnorm(1, mean = -0.005, sd = 0.01) # Q3 return
RQ4 <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.025, sd = 0.01) # Q4 return

Rannual <- (1+RQ1) * (1+RQ2) * (1+RQ3) * (1+RQ4) - 1


```

A stock paid quarterly dividends with realized returns: Q1: **`r round(RQ1*100, 2)`%**, Q2: **`r round(RQ2*100, 2)`%**, Q3: **`r round(RQ3*100, 2)`%**, and Q4: **`r round(RQ4*100, 2)`%**.
